articles.author: Valerie Volcovici
articles.title: COP28 advisory board member resigns over reports of UAE fossil fuel dealmaking - Reuters
articles.description: A member of the main advisory board of the COP28 climate summit resigned on Friday over reports the UAE presidency planned to use the meeting to secure oil, gas deals, according to her resignation letter seen by Reuters.
articles.content: DUBAI, Dec 1 (Reuters) - A member of the main advisory board of the COP28 climate summit resigned on Friday over reports the UAE presidency planned to use the meeting to secure oil, gas deals, accord… [+2159 chars]
